pages.text: Deinotherium wander the warm landscapes of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Deinotherium alongside Horses and Cows. $(br2)Deinotherium can be tamed much like horses and can have saddles, chests, and even carpets.
When tamed, they can carry up to 2 players. $(br2)Deinotherium enjoy: $(br2)Apples and Beetroots. (Includes TFC variants)
